column4: Hi, all.. Is there an alternative to x11vnc based on Spice protocol or something like this ? (need to access remote desktop via LAN to play 3D games)
3d games via remote desktop? performance would be atrocious i would have thought
VNC performance is terrible.... But PCoIP  is fine...  I want to use Spice, PCoIP-like protocol not for VM , but for real hardware
i've never used vnc and i'm not much of a gamer, so i'm probably not a good person to ask
